title: The Fantasy Court + Rankings Debates - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/3
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, court is in session! Andy, Mike, and Jason deliver ranking arguments and defenses to Judge Giamatti & The Fantasy Court. Plus, NFL News updates, and team defenses to target for Week 1! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 3rd, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (04:30) - FootClan Friday
 (05:25) - NFL News
 (11:40) - Fantasy Court
 (11:50) - Amari Cooper
 (16:35) - Brandin Cooks
 (27:10) - Trevor Lawrence
 (34:15) - Mailbag
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web

 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
